page.title: 11TRANSPORT
page.content:
The types of transport in the block fall into these main categories: a.Private motor cars b.Public transport c.Commercial vehicles d.Pedestrians and bicycles. e.Private bus services
The Public transport System consists of the local City bus service run by the local council and a county bus service called the Midland Red,this serves the villages and smaller towns. Some of the larger firms on the industrial estate have their own private bus fleet which collects and returns their employees from all over the county. Part of the MI motorway passes through the block and is used by the local businesses to transport goods all over the country.
